name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】HOPE IS ON THE MOVE! #3DRyS [dR9q_J-8mfM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and Tokoyami Towa talk on stage after their performance. They exchange compliments and say their goodbyes.
Transition scene showing the virtual cityscape as IRyS prepares for her solo performance.
IRyS performs a solo cover of 'Baka Mitai'.

subtitles.original: むしろそれがいい。
subtitles.english: Actually, I like it that way.

subtitles.original: ほんとに？むしろそれがいい？
subtitles.english: Really? You like it that way?

subtitles.original: アイリスの... いいな、からだ。
subtitles.english: IRyS's... I like it, your body.

subtitles.original: あ、そう。これからいっぱい牛乳飲めばいけんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Oh, really? If I drink lots of milk from now on, I'll be fine, right?

subtitles.original: 牛乳飲めば、イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Drink milk! Yay!

subtitles.original: まあということでね、このあとも歌うんだよね？
subtitles.english: Well then, we're going to sing another one after this, right?

subtitles.original: うん、バリバリ歌います。
subtitles.english: Yep, I'm gonna sing my heart out.

subtitles.original: 今日は誘ってくれてありがとう、本当に嬉しかった。
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting me today, I was really happy.

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとう、本当に。
subtitles.english: The pleasure's mine, thank you, really.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ一緒に歌えてマジで。今後もトワ先輩みたいな歌歌えるように頑張るわ。
subtitles.english: I'm so glad we could sing together. I'll do my best to sing like you, Towa-senpai.

subtitles.original: えー、嬉しい、ありがとう。じゃあこの後の歌も頑張って。
subtitles.english: Aw, that makes me happy, thanks. Good luck with the next song too.

subtitles.original: はい！呼んでくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Yes! Thanks for having me today!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、バイバイ！またね！頑張れー！
subtitles.english: Thank you, bye-bye! See ya! Good luck!

subtitles.original:
ばかみたい
Lyrics: 堀井亮佑 Composition: 福山光晴
subtitles.english:
Baka Mitai
Lyrics: Ryosuke Horii Composition: Mitsuharu Fukuyama

subtitles.original: ばかみたい 子供なのね
subtitles.english: I'm such a fool, just like a child

subtitles.original: 夢を追って 傷ついて
subtitles.english: Chasing dreams and getting hurt

subtitles.original: 嘘が下手なくせに
subtitles.english: Even though I'm a bad liar

subtitles.original: 笑えない笑顔みせた
subtitles.english: I showed a smile that couldn't even laugh

subtitles.original: I love youも ろくに言わない
subtitles.english: I can't even say "I love you" properly

subtitles.original: 口下手で ほんまに不器用
subtitles.english: So poor with words, truly clumsy

subtitles.original: なのに なのにどうして
subtitles.english: And yet, and yet, why

subtitles.original: サヨナラは言えたの
subtitles.english: Was I able to say goodbye?

subtitles.original: だめだね だめよ だめなのよ
subtitles.english: It's no good, no good, it's just no good

subtitles.original: あんたが好きで 好きすぎて
subtitles.english: I love you, I love you too much

subtitles.original: どれだけ 強いお酒でも
subtitles.english: No matter how strong the alcohol is

subtitles.original: 歪まない思い出が
subtitles.english: Memories that won't blur

subtitles.original: ばかみたい
subtitles.english: What a fool

subtitles.original: ばかみたい 本当バカね
subtitles.english: What a fool, a real fool

subtitles.original: あんた信じる ばかりで
subtitles.english: Only ever believing in you

subtitles.original: 強い女のふり
subtitles.english: Pretending to be a strong woman

subtitles.original: 切なさの夜風浴びる
subtitles.english: Bathing in the night breeze of sadness

subtitles.original: 一人になって 3年が過ぎ
subtitles.english: Three years have passed since I became alone

subtitles.original: 街並みさえも 変わりました
subtitles.english: Even the cityscape has changed

subtitles.original: なのに なのにどうして
subtitles.english: And yet, and yet, why

subtitles.original: 未練だけ置き去り
subtitles.english: Were only the lingering regrets left behind?

subtitles.original: ほんまに ろくな男やない
subtitles.english: Truly, you're a no-good man

subtitles.original: 揃いの指輪 はずします
subtitles.english: I'll take off our matching rings

subtitles.original: ざまあみろ せいせいするわ
subtitles.english: Serve you right, I feel refreshed

subtitles.original: いい加減 待ってても ばかみたい
subtitles.english: Waiting forever is just foolish

subtitles.original: だめだね だめよ だめなのよ
subtitles.english: It's no good, no good, it's just no good

subtitles.original: あんたが好きで 好きすぎて
subtitles.english: I love you, I love you too much

subtitles.original: どれだけ 強いお酒でも
subtitles.english: No matter how strong the alcohol is

subtitles.original: 歪まない思い出が
subtitles.english: Memories that won't blur

subtitles.original: ばかみたい
subtitles.english: What a fool

subtitles.original: ほんまに ろくな男やない
subtitles.english: Truly, you're a no-good man

subtitles.original: 揃いの指輪 はずします
subtitles.english: I'll take off our matching rings

subtitles.original: ざまあみろ せいせいするわ
subtitles.english: Serve you right, I feel refreshed
